data.name: RED OPS ARCADE
data.detailed_description:
Red Ops Arcade is a survival and fighting game that takes place across different worlds. The player has to fight zombies, monsters, ghosts and many other enemies, using different weapons that he will find in mystery boxes. The player must reach the highest round possible, but be careful because as higher is the level, more difficult will be to finish it .

Fight wave after wave to get score and diamonds!
*4 Maps to play on (More are being designed)
*Buy new weapons
*Skins
*25 + Weapons available
*Tons of weapons
*All Perk a Cola's from the original Black Ops Zombies
*Buy Wonder weapons from the Pack-a-punch
*Buy guns from the Mystery Box!
*Buy keys from the Mystery Box!
*Multiplayer soon available
*Find some easter eggs
data.about_the_game:
Red Ops Arcade is a survival and fighting game that takes place across different worlds. The player has to fight zombies, monsters, ghosts and many other enemies, using different weapons that he will find in mystery boxes. The player must reach the highest round possible, but be careful because as higher is the level, more difficult will be to finish it .

Fight wave after wave to get score and diamonds!

data.short_description: Is this a rip off from COD Zombies ? Pehaps . I developed this game because I am a huge fan of the zombies franchise , ans i have not yet seen a arcade game that gave the same vibe , so I tried to create my own.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 Mo MB RAM
  • Graphics: Carte comportant 128 Mo de mémoire vidéo, avec support Shader Model 1.1
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 9.0c ou ultérieure
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: OS: Windows 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: Processor: Dual Core 3.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Video Card: 256mb Video Memory, capable of Shader Model 2.0+
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: 9.0c ou ultérieure
